text: Polɨn akɨnafarir osiriziba, da zurara bizir kabar gun mɨgei. Guizbangɨra, akar maba akɨnafarir kabar aven ikiava, egha deravɨra bigha mɨgeir puvatɨ. Ezɨ e akar kabar mɨngarim gɨfoghasa bar ingangarir dafam gami. Ezɨ gumazir fofozir muziariba ko nɨghnɨzir gavgavir muziariba, me Polɨn osirizibagh iragha pazava a mɨgei. Egha uaghan Godɨn akɨnafarimɨn itir akar igharaziba sara paza dav gei. Kamaghɨn me uarira uari gasɨghasɨsi, eghtɨ God gɨn me gasɨghasɨgham.
